tmont:
I'm not sure about this. Why replace sexy images of one celebrity with sexy pictures of another?
Maybe the sample images should just be different shades of beige so as not to offend anyone of any kind of gender.
Although, certain people might have a beige fetish, so maybe an option to switch the hue might be an easy way to ensure that people who identify as a beige fetishist won't feel like we're singling them out for being weirdos.
Perhaps the best solution is to not show the demo by default, and start with the question "which color is the least sexually attractive to you?" and use that hue for the sample images. However, you'll have to reassure them that you won't be doing anything malicious with such potentially sensitive data.
Maybe the true solution is to re-implement this whole library in pure CSS with no JavaScript whatsoever. That has the polycephalic advantage of:
1. Ensuring users that you won't track their huesexual preferences
2. It'll work offline, so noscript and other JS blockers will still work with this library
Thoughts?
.

matteoferigo:
Reset method will reset everything (for example rotation), and I just want to reset zoom
Is it possible to get the initial zoom value on ready event? It's helpful as well
Thanks. Toggle is switching from full-size of the image to the full-size of the container. I just want to switch to the full-size of the container. Ok, I catched the original ratio during viewed event:
viewed ({target: {viewer}}) {
     originalRatio = viewer.initialImageData.ratio
}
and then I used viewer.zoomTo(originalRatio) to set the container full-size.
iygnol:
这个有一个处理方法：使用一个占位图替代，然后js控制把要显示的img的src替换过来，再update一下就可以了，我之前也遇到图片太多挂掉的情况。
我的具体做法：
1、所有的图片初始化都是占位图；
2、把展示的大图前后5张小图（共最多11张）加载出来；
3、每次选中一张新图片，执行2. 对了，我用的是jquery版本的.

iframe中的代码：
```
var vd = new viewer(document.getElementById(pId),
                                            {
                                                url: 'layer-src',//原图路径
                                                container: $("body", top.window.document)[0],
                                                loop: true,//循环
                                                scalable: false,//反转
                                                toolbar: {
                                                    zoomIn: 1,
                                                    zoomOut: 1,
                                                    oneToOne: 0,
                                                    reset: 0,
                                                    prev: 1,
                                                    play: {
                                                        show: 1,
                                                        size: 'large',
                                                    },
                                                    next: 1,
                                                    rotateLeft: 1,
                                                    rotateRight: 1,
                                                    flipHorizontal: 1,
                                                    flipVertical: 1,

                                            });
```
